nodes.text: A senatorial miter was a type of tall Neimoidian hat with an arrow shaped point at the apex. Senator Lott Dod wore a dark blue senatorial miter proudly to show his position and stature while serving in the Senate of the Galactic Republic.
A senatorial miter first appeared in the 1999 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. It was first identified in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
